attributes.action: Enforce stricter punishment for animal cruelty.
attributes.additional_details: I would like this to be done because so often I see true horror stories about innocent animals who have been neglected and abused. People who have committed these awful crimes have had a ban from having animals and community service. I think if people are capable of this such a light punishment wont stop them from doing it again or anyone else from doing it at all. Animals deserve better.
attributes.background: Consider my suggestion to help prevent animal cruelty and hold people accountable for the awful crimes committed.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Ban Private Dog Breeding and Strengthen Penalties for Animal Cruelty
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/728177
